ygData.subject: RE: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: Why does someone need this to level? Are you using them to kite or what? If you need these boots, why didn t you try getting a group together with a shaman
ygData.messageBody:
Why does someone "need" this to level? Are you using them to kite or what?
If you "need" these boots, why didn't you try getting a group together with
a shaman in it?
I'm not trying to flame or anything just curious as to why someone wouldn't
be able
To advance without an item.
John

-----Original Message-----
From: IDS [SMTP:ids@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 6:24 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] ___JBoots___


Well some people need Jboots to keep leveling like necros. I was
willing to
camp them for as long as it took. But this is the only item I'm
willing to
camp this long, nothing else is worth that much time camping.
